DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Outcome Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity Status Date and Time ISO21090.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A judgment of the final state of a person who experienced an adverse event, which takes place after the adverse event occurs. The date (and time) on which the status is assigned to the activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Outcome Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity Status Date and Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:The result of an action.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._A condition or state at a particular time.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Adverse Event Outcome Assessment Observation Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:The result of an action.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains TS so that it's precision can not be more precise than seconds.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
